settings.heading: Solutions on  and off the court
Pickleball Providers

UTR Sports innovates pickleball through developing solutions for all providers of the game, including through our pickleball club management software. From clubs to high schools to federations, and everything in between, UTR Sports has a solution to drive your business forward.
What is the UTR Pickleball Rating?
settings.row_content:
Equipped with over a decade of expertise as the creator of the gold-standard UTR Rating for tennis, UTR Sports offers the most accurate and reliable global rating for pickleball.

The UTR Pickleball Rating (UTR-P) is designed to rate every kind of player, whether you're swinging your first paddle or smashing through pro-level tournaments. The UTR-P includes both provisional and numerical ratings for singles and doubles players.

Players without match results logged will receive a provisional rating (P1-P5) based on a questionnaire. After one match, the player will receive a projected rating, and after seven matches, the rating automatically converts to a reliable decimal rating on a scale of 1.0 - 10.0 (from beginner to expert/pro).

settings.heading: What are the benefits of UTR Sports to pickleball players?
settings.row_content:
UTR Sports offers pickleball players several key benefits:

  1. Find Matches Easily: Quickly discover local matches, events, and pickleball players at your skill level.
  2. Accurate Skill Tracking: Track your pickleball rating accurately with the industry-leading UTR Pickleball Rating system.
  3. Personalized Play: Enjoy tailored recommendations for pickleball matches and tournaments based on your skill level and preferences.
  4. Progress Insights: View analytics on your performance to identify areas to improve.
  5. Join Competitive Events: Easily find and register for tournaments, leagues, and flexible play opportunities in your area.
  6. Community Connection: Connect with other pickleball players, join clubs, create and/or join pickleball groups, and build your pickleball network effortlessly.

Overall, UTR helps pickleball players of all levels improve their game, find suitable opponents, and enjoy pickleball more than ever before.

settings.heading: Is a UTR Sports profile free?
settings.row_content: Yes! Everyone is encouraged to create a FREE UTR Sports profile and start playing pickleball with us today.

settings.heading: Who’s the app for?
settings.row_content: Everyone is encouraged to download and use the UTR Sports iOS app! Join a thriving pickleball community. Find local pickleball matches and events, follow players you know, and track your progress. Download now and start playing pickleball.

settings.heading: How do I register for and play a pickleball event?
How is the UTR Pickleball Rating calculated?
settings.row_content: For each match, the algorithm calculates a match rating and a match weight for each player. A player’s UTR-P Rating is the weighted average of up to 60 of their most recent match ratings.

settings.heading: What's the best way to improve my UTR Pickleball Rating?
settings.row_content:
Play Well – Performing well in matches is the easiest way to improve your UTR-P Rating. If the match is out of hand, don’t give up! It does not matter whether you play higher- or lower-rated opponents; you can improve your UTR-P either way by winning more points than expected.

Play Often – The more matches you play, the quicker your UTR-P Rating will reflect your current form. The algorithm is especially accurate for those who play often against a variety of opponents rated above and below you.

Be Patient – Since your UTR-P Rating is a rolling weighted average, the effect of new results is slightly lagged. Your UTR-P Rating may not fully reflect a recent outcome right away, but it will over time.

settings.heading: What pickleball events does UTR Sports offer?
settings.row_content: Looking to 'play pickleball near you?'. UTR Sports has a wide range of pickleball events, including flex leagues and tournaments throughout the world! Players can search and find pickleball events around the world on the UTR Sports website and on our iOS app, UTR Sports.
